item.title: HUB3: Besøg af pølsevognen med det hele | | Han tager også veganske pølser med | Monday | Yellow Curry with Chicken – A mild and aromatic curry with creamy coconut milk, turmeric, potatoes and fresh ginger. Served with rice and fresh coriander, but only for those who want it. | Yellow Curry with Chickpeas and Squash – A mild and aromatic curry with creamy coconut milk, turmeric, potatoes and fresh ginger. Served with rice and fresh coriander, but only for those who want it. | Tuesday | Köfte made with Danish beef, feta and sun-dried tomatoes – Straight from the Greek archipelago. Served with oven-roasted potatoes, tzatziki and a salad with cucumber, red onion and fresh oregano | Served with oven-roasted potatoes, tzatziki and a salad with cucumber, red onion and fresh oregano | Wednesday | Chinese fried noodles with eggs, hoisin sauce, pak choy, carrots, bean sprouts and sesame. The dish is flavored with ginger, garlic and lemongrass | Cake of the day | Aromatic caramelized pineapple and vanilla cake | Thursday | The sailor’s favorite dish – made with love and lots of time. | “Skipper’s labskovs” made with Danish beef chuck, potatoes, fresh bay leaf and black pepper. Served with pickled beets mustard, rye bread and chives | Zanzibar style stew with coconut milk, sweet potatoes, greens, chickpeas, sambal oelek, peanut butter and rice | Friday | Visit from the hot dog stand with everything | ….And he also brings vegan sausages | Vegetar | Vegetariske koöfte lavet på bønner, feta og soltørrede tomater. | Vegetarian | Vegetarian köfte made with beans, feta and sun-dried tomatoes.
